title: Trump's Iran Threat; Carter Page and Michael Cohen: A Closer Look | Jacob Soboroff
description:
Seth takes a closer look at President Trump once again accusing the FBI of "spying" on him while it turns out his own lawyer was, in fact, spying on him.

Then, Jacob Soboroff tells Seth about his very awkward conversation with Joe Biden, reporting on the U.S.-Mexico border and the problems with Trump's border wall.

After that, Soboroff takes a few more questions backstage from Late Night's Henry Melcher.
